channel.title: RAG on Shel (Run) Zhou's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in RAG on Shel (Run) Zhou's Blog

item.title: Everything About RAG. Learn In Progress
item.description: Introduction Following the same philosophy, I aim to first learn about the RAG system by constructing a generic version and then applying optimization techniques. This method will assist me in understanding the pain points, which will in turn guide our brainstorming toward viable applications. As someone who is not very tech-savvy, my primary goal is to grasp the mental model underlying the RAG system. Imagine you are Harry Potter. You want to find everything about the fantastic beast, Niffler, to prepare for your exam.
